    LonlineAppender

    This class extends AppenderSkeletonAdapter and implements the append method from log4j AppenderSkeleton class. The append method will be called by log4j and this way, log4j will validate if a log must be printed according to the established level.

    Author:
    Eleazar Gomez

    • Method Detail

      • append

        protected void append(org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent loggingEvent)
        This methods receives the LoggingEvent either from log4j or Lonline class. If the caller is LonlineLog the LoggingEvent is instance of LonlineEvent. This situation occurs when addition information will be sent to Dynamicloud
        Overrides:
        append in class AppenderSkeletonAdapter
        Parameters:
        loggingEvent - LoggingEvent with the level, text and trace. If this loggingEvent is instance of LonlineEvent then an additionalInformation attribute is included.
